features: Package quantity: 3 pieces Ski Mask balaclava face mask is made of high-quality breathable UPF 50+ mesh fabric, super comfortable, lightweight, and durable. Protect your head and face from UV rays, dust, and wind

Various color selections&Lightweight Comfoft: The balaclava face mask designed with various colors, enough for you to match with different color of clothes, balaclava provides you with the cooling and comfortable feeling throughout the whole hot days You’ll be surprised by how warm this lightweight, breathable, and extra-stretchy balaclava head mask is. Designed from an 89% Polyester and 11% Spandex, our balaclava wicks away moisture while retaining heat. You’ll stay comfortable and dry all day!

WINTER READY:when winter is coming, the full face cover mask will be a useful tool for you, you can wear it to go skiing, snowboarding, hunting, shooting, running, tactical training, climbing, trekking, camping, and more outdoor activities in hot weather

ULTIMATE PROTECTION & VERSATILITY: COLD, WIND, DUST, SNOW, SLEET, RAIN, UV and other elements are no match. Choose the style of the balaclava according to your actual needs: a full face mask cover, open balaclava, half ski mask, hoodie, or neck gaiter. Whatever you like!You can wear this balaclava on its own or under a helmet with goggles/glasses as a full face mask cover, open balaclava, half ski mask or neck gaiter. Warm gifts for men women this winter!

🎁GREAT TO SHARE (GREAT GIFT IDEA TOO!) – while you are enjoy it, send it to your family, friends, or people you loved as a gift for Christmas, New Years, Valentine's Day, Father's day, Mother's Day etc! Also,it's a great gift to runners, athletes, fitness workouts, hiking, cycling, or anyone who need it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a great product that i will use to help me keep my face and neck warm for hunting! Good quality and a great fit. Allows enough space to put a hat on as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Decent Wind Protection
reviews.reviewText: I do a lot of riding (bicycles, motorcycles) in fairly cold conditions at times and my face gets pretty cold from wind chill. I have an old balaclava, but it’s very basic and thin and while it works fine, I wanted one with a bit more heft and with a more distinct “flap” to make it easier to expose my nose/face when I need to. These definitely do the trick. I’d say these are more of a wind deflector/blocker as they aren’t super warm, but for me that’s what I wanted. One thing to note is the open/eye area is a bit short, so if you don’t have it positioned perfectly the lower face part can ride up into the bottom of your eyes. The best part of these are the separate lower face/nose part makes it much easier to pull down than my 1-piece balaclava. Note these did have a very synthetic smell when the first arrived, but after a handful of washes that has gone away. And of course being a 3-pack is a bonus as I can now go a few rides before I have to do the wash.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent… received just in time
reviews.reviewText: Got these just before the coldest temps of the year! It was perfect as I had to travel to an airport shuttle stop and then to the airport in negative temps in Colorado. Helped my face not completely freeze off while I took my luggage from my car to the shuttle. 3 for $10 felt like a great price too! Worth it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great product! Will buy again in different colors

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for kids
reviews.reviewText: Product features:Got these for my daughter as her ski masks, they are easy to put on but fairly thin, so if you ski in extreme cold it might not be sufficient. The skirt is very long, making it easy to be fully covered by whatever you wear on the outside fully covering your head and neck and blocking wind. They used the same material throughout, so there's not an area specifically for breathing. I am not sure about the uv protection claim as it's fairly thin.Quality:Fairly thing fabric but otherwise there's no problem with it, size is great for kids and adult due to the stretching. Keep in mind you get 3 for the price so you shouldn't be expecting the same performance of a single piece that costs twice as much.Price:$9.99 for a pack of 3 cannot be beat.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Husband loved it
reviews.reviewText: I got this for my husband He uses it for roofing outsideHas really helped with with the wind burns and the cold love that it came in a pack of 3 and different colors too!He already recommended it to his co workers

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Not as thick as i thought…my husband doubled them up cause he works in the freezer at work. Really do not block out the cold
